sentences.sContent: The nucleus accumbens is associated with other kinds of longing — for alcohol and drugs — and is more dense in the neurotransmitter dopamine than in serotonin.
sentences.sContent_eng: The nucleus accumbens is associated with other kinds of longing — for alcohol and drugs — and is more dense in the neurotransmitter dopamine than in serotonin.
sentences.sCn: 阿肯柏氏核还与其他种类的渴望（比如嗜酒，嗑药）相联系---而且在血清素里神经传递素多巴胺的浓度更高。

words.tran: [生物] 亲神经的；[生物] 嗜神经组织的
神经病患者；神经过敏者
[心理] 神经症；神经衰弱症
神经质，[心理] 神经过敏症

trans.tranCn: [生理] 神经递质；[生理] 神经传递素
trans.tranOther: a chemical by which a nerve cell communicates with another nerve cell or with a muscle
